fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on spends above ₹8,00,000 in a year

benefits.description: Complimentary airport lounge access in India and abroad
Complimentary golf rounds and lessons via Mastercard Golf Program
Instant conversion of reward points to airline miles and hotel loyalty programs via HSBC app
Discounts on flights, hotels, holidays, and duty-free bookings through partner platforms

milestones.declaredReward: 10,000 bonus reward points on annual spends exceeding ₹12,00,000

declaredWelcomeBenefits.description: Spend ₹10,000 within 30 days to receive ₹1,000 cashback, ₹3,000 PostCard voucher, and 3 months EazyDiner Prime membership
Earn 3,000 bonus reward points on spending ₹1,00,000 within the first 90 days

declaredConstraints.description: Accelerated reward categories are capped at 50,000 reward points per month
4 reward points per ₹100 on flights, travel aggregators, and foreign currency spends; 2 points per ₹100 on other eligible spends
Foreign currency cashback offer (3.5%) valid until 30 June 2026 and requires SMS registration

declaredEligibility.description: Indian resident aged between 18 and 65 years
Minimum annual income of ₹6,00,000 for salaried individuals
Available only to residents of select cities across India
